page.title: 14 Coleford Wesley Church
page.content: On the 13th of June a group of children went to the{Coleford Wesley {church.}A man met us down there.When we went in the{chapel}I asked him some questions and he told me all the answers. He told us a story about when he went to school. " A boy came back with a bit of a German plane that had crashed nearby then all the boys went (in school time! ) to get a bit of the plane but a policeman saw them and sent them all back to school where they all got something _ {the cane!}" After we had been to the chapel we went to the{parish church.}Sherree and I said we would count the graves we counted fifty graves and got fed up and went back in the church and went and looked at the{bell rope.}A man pulled it three times, then we came back to school. I enjoyed the afternoon.
